Come Over to the Light Side

It’s important to have connections you can count on. Whether it’s watching the game of the week, shopping online, streaming your favorite series, or gaming with friends, FiOS® by Frontier is the best equipped network to handle all the devices in your home at the same time.

Fiber Optics Changes Your Life Online

Play, connect, post, download, stream, upload, watch. The FiOS® 100% fiber-optic network withstands even the worst weather. And gives you bandwidth you need to drive all your devices. Together. All at the same time.

Upload as Fast as You Download

Cable only talks about download internet speeds. But the Internet is a 2-way street, and you need fast upload speeds for everyday activities like sharing pictures and videos. So if your Internet is slow, you need fast internet speeds from FiOS®.

Tell us what you want

Do you talk to your Amazon dot, Echo or tap? Now you can ask Alexa to change your channels or search your guide. She’ll listen…and act.
